title:
SU(N) algebras and new thumbrules for entanglement of bipartite qubit
  and qutrit systems
abstract:
Based on the Schmidt decomposition new convenient thumbrules are obtained to
test entanglement of wavefunctions for bipartite qubit and qutrit systems. For
the qubit system there is an underlying SU(2) algebra , while the same for a
qutrit system is SU(3).
